lead_paragraph: Imagine chronicling Hitler meeting Mussolini. Einstein comparing notes with Oppenheimer. The Kennedys. Winston Churchill. Martin Luther King Jr. Hemingway and T. S. Eliot and George Bernard Shaw. A tuxedoed Marlene Dietrich in Berlin, a sultry Sophia Loren on a film set in Rome and an almost-domestic Marilyn Monroe at home. A glowering Joseph Goebbels, in a bone-chilling portrait of hatred.
snippet: No war had ended, but that didn't keep this couple from celebrating in Times Square, as Librado Romero explains.

headline.main: This Kiss Wasn't Just a Kiss

abstract: No war had ended, but that didn't keep this couple from celebrating in Times Square, as Librado Romero explains.
